title: No Sad Song
description: She'd use her head, and not lose her heartAhead of Annabel lay a brilliant career. If, that is, the talented young singer accepted the renowned Piers Bellingham as her agent.But in Annabel's mind the top-smooth entrepreneur was responsible for the heartbreak and accidental death of her dear friend Kate. Annabel didn't want to be anywhere near the man!Inevitably Annabel had to accept that Piers was the best. She'd be a fool to refuse his offer. Refusing his advances, Annabel assured herself, would not be a problem.
author: Alison York
